mapper.select:
/* getEmpSalaryManageList */ SELECT EI.EMP_SEQ, EI.EMP_NAME_KR, EI.RES_REGIS_NUM, DATEDIFF(now(), EI.JOIN_DAY) as DIFF_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(EI.JOIN_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS JOIN_DAY, CASE WHEN EI.DIVISION = '0' THEN '정규직원' WHEN EI.DIVISION = '4' AND EI.DIVISION_SUB = '1' THEN '계약직원' WHEN EI.DIVISION = '4' AND EI.DIVISION_SUB = '2' THEN '인턴사원' END AS DIVISION, CONCAT(EI.DEPT_NAME, IF(EI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME != '', CONCAT('/', EI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME), '')) AS DEPT_NAME, SM.START_DT, SM.END_DT, SM.BASIC_SALARY, SM.FOOD_PAY, SM.EXTRA_PAY, SM.BONUS, SM.BUSN_PAY, SM.RETIRE_PAY, RS.NATIONAL_PENSION, RS.LIMIT_AMT, RS.HEALTH_INSURANCE, RS.LONG_CARE_INSURANCE, RS.EMPLOY_INSURANCE, RS.ACCIDENT_INSURANCE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SALARY_MANAGE SM JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO EI ON SM.EMP_SEQ = EI.EMP_SEQ JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SOCIAL_RATE RS ON SM.SOCIAL_RATE_SN = RS.SOCIAL_RATE_SN WHERE 1=1
AND EI.WORK_STATUS_CODE = #{workStatusCode}
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(EI.JOIN_DAY, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(EI.JOIN_DAY, '%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(EI.RESIGN_DAY, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(EI.RESIGN_DAY, '%Y%m%d')
AND ( DATE_FORMAT(SM.START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR DATE_FORMAT(SM.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') )
AND EI.DIVISION = '0'
AND EI.DIVISION = '4' AND EI.DIVISION_SUB = '1'
AND EI.DIVISION = '4' AND EI.DIVISION_SUB = '2'
AND EI.EMP_NAME_KR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND EI.DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND EI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND EI.EMP_NAME_KR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND (YEAR(SM.START_DT) = #{year} OR YEAR(SM.END_DT) = #{year})
ORDER BY EI.EMP_NAME_KR

/* getEmpSalaryDataList */ SELECT EI.EMP_SEQ, EI.EMP_NAME_KR, EI.RES_REGIS_NUM, DATE_FORMAT(EI.JOIN_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS JOIN_DAY, CASE WHEN EI.DIVISION = '0' THEN '정규직원' WHEN EI.DIVISION = '4' AND EI.DIVISION_SUB = '1' THEN '계약직원' WHEN EI.DIVISION = '4' AND EI.DIVISION_SUB = '2' THEN '인턴사원' END AS DIVISION, CONCAT(EI.DEPT_NAME, IF(EI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME != '', CONCAT('/', EI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME), '')) AS DEPT_NAME, SM.START_DT, SM.END_DT, SM.BASIC_SALARY, SM.FOOD_PAY, SM.EXTRA_PAY, SM.BONUS, SM.BUSN_PAY, SM.RETIRE_PAY, RS.NATIONAL_PENSION, RS.LIMIT_AMT, RS.HEALTH_INSURANCE, RS.LONG_CARE_INSURANCE, RS.EMPLOY_INSURANCE, RS.ACCIDENT_INSURANCE, SM.SOCIAL_RATE_SN, SM.SALARY_SN FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SALARY_MANAGE SM JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO EI ON SM.EMP_SEQ = EI.EMP_SEQ JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SOCIAL_RATE RS ON SM.SOCIAL_RATE_SN = RS.SOCIAL_RATE_SN WHERE SM.EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} ORDER BY SM.START_DT DESC
mapper.insert: /*insSalaryManage*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SALARY_MANAGE ( SOCIAL_RATE_SN, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, START_DT, END_DT, BASIC_SALARY, FOOD_PAY, EXTRA_PAY, BONUS, BUSN_PAY, RETIRE_PAY, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{socialRateSn}, #{empSeq}, #{empName}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{basicSalary}, #{foodPay}, #{extraPay}, #{bonus}, #{busnPay}, #{retirePay}, #{loginEmpSeq} )
mapper.update: /*updSalaryManage*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SALARY_MANAGE SET SOCIAL_RATE_SN = #{socialRateSn}, START_DT = #{startDt}, END_DT = #{endDt}, BASIC_SALARY = #{basicSalary}, FOOD_PAY = #{foodPay}, EXTRA_PAY = #{extraPay}, BONUS = #{bonus}, BUSN_PAY = #{busnPay}, RETIRE_PAY = #{retirePay}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE SALARY_SN = #{salarySn}
mapper.insert:
/* setSocialRate */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SOCIAL_RATE ( START_DATE, END_DATE, NATIONAL_PENSION, LIMIT_AMT, HEALTH_INSURANCE, LONG_CARE_INSURANCE, EMPLOY_INSURANCE, ACCIDENT_INSURANCE, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES
( #{item.startDate}, #{item.endDate}, #{item.nationalPension}, #{item.limitAmt}, #{item.healthInsurance}, #{item.longCareInsurance}, #{item.employInsurance}, #{item.accidentInsurance}, #{item.empSeq} )
mapper.update: /* setSocialRateUpd */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SOCIAL_RATE SET START_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, NATIONAL_PENSION = #{nationalPension}, LIMIT_AMT = #{limitAmt}, HEALTH_INSURANCE = #{healthInsurance}, LONG_CARE_INSURANCE = #{longCareInsurance}, EMPLOY_INSURANCE = #{employInsurance}, ACCIDENT_INSURANCE = #{accidentInsurance}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE SOCIAL_RATE_SN = #{socialRateSn}
/* setSocialRateDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SOCIAL_RATE SET ACTIVE = 'N', MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE SOCIAL_RATE_SN = #{socialRateSn}
mapper.select: /*getSalaryList*/ SELECT EI.EMP_SEQ, EI.EMP_NAME_KR, CONCAT(EI.DEPT_NAME, IF(EI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME != '', CONCAT('/', EI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME), '')) AS DEPT_NAME, SM.START_DT, SM.END_DT, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, SM.START_DT, SM.END_DT) + 1 AS DIFF_MON, SM.BASIC_SALARY, SM.EXTRA_PAY, SM.BONUS, SM.FOOD_PAY, SM.SOCIAL_RATE_SN FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SALARY_MANAGE SM JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO EI ON SM.EMP_SEQ = EI.EMP_SEQ WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert:
/*insSalaryManageList*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_MON_SALARY ( SOCIAL_RATE_SN, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, DEPT_NAME, MON, BASIC_SALARY, EXTRA_PAY, BONUS, FOOD_PAY ) VALUES
( #{item.socialRateSn}, #{item.empSeq}, #{item.empName}, #{item.deptName}, #{item.mon}, #{item.bsSal}, #{item.extraPay}, #{item.bonus}, #{item.foodPay} )
mapper.select: SELECT SOCIAL_RATE_SN FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SOCIAL_RATE WHERE (IF(#{endDt} = '9999-12-31', (#{startDt} BETWEEN START_DATE AND #{endDt}) OR (#{endDt} BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE), ((#{startDt} BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE) AND #{endDt} BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE))) ORDER BY SOCIAL_RATE_SN LIMIT 1
SELECT ERP_EMP_SEQ ,EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y' AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DEPT_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND ERP_EMP_SEQ != '' AND EMP_NAME_KR NOT IN ('관리자', '부관리자')
SELECT EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE ERP_EMP_SEQ = #{erpEmpSeq} LIMIT 1

/* getPayRollLedgerList */ SELECT A.*, B.DUTY_CODE, IF(C.DEPT_LEVEL = 1, C.DEPT_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME) AS DEPT_NAME, C.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_TEAM_NAME, IFNULL(A.DUTY_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.DISP_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.JOB_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.MST_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.CCR_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.ANN_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.OVER_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.RD_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.VAC_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.QF_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.WF_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.IT_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.RES_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.PERF_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.CB_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.SI_PAY,0) AS EXTRA_PAY, IFNULL(A.SOC_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.SOC_TRIP_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.END_TAX_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.END_TAX_LOC_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.FINS_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.SOC_ENGN_PAY,0) + IFNULL(A.DORM_PAY,0) AS ETC_PAY FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_PAY_ROLL_LEGER A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO B ON A.ERP_EMP_CD = B.ERP_EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO C ON C.DEPT_SEQ = B.DEPT_SEQ LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO D ON D.DEPT_SEQ = C.PARENT_DEPT_SEQ WHERE A.BASE_YEAR_MONTH LIKE CONCAT(#{baseYear}, '%') AND A.EMP_TYPE like '%전담%'
AND A.EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND ( B.DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR D.DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') )
AND ( A.EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR B.DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR D.DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') )
ORDER BY BASE_YEAR_MONTH, D.ORDER_SN, C.ORDER_SN

/* getPayRollLedgerStatusList */ SELECT RE.*, HETH_PAY + CARE_PAY + NAT_PAY + EMPL_PAY AS DEDUCTION FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(BASE_YEAR_MONTH, '-', -1) AS MONTH, SUM(SUP_PAY) AS TOTAL_PAY, SUM(IFNULL(HETH_PAY,0)) AS HETH_PAY, SUM(IFNULL(CARE_PAY,0)) AS CARE_PAY, SUM(IFNULL(NAT_PAY,0)) AS NAT_PAY, SUM(IFNULL(EMPL_PAY,0)) AS EMPL_PAY FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_PAY_ROLL_LEGER WHERE BASE_YEAR_MONTH LIKE CONCAT(#{baseYear}, '%') GROUP BY BASE_YEAR_MONTH ) RE
mapper.delete: /* setPayRollLegerDel */ DELETE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_PAY_ROLL_LEGER WHERE BASE_YEAR_MONTH = #{baseYearMonth}
/* setPayRollCompDel */ DELETE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_PAY_ROLL_COMP WHERE BASE_YEAR_MONTH = #{baseYearMonth}
mapper.insert:
/* setPayRollLeger */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_PAY_ROLL_LEGER ( BASE_YEAR_MONTH, EMP_TYPE, ERP_EMP_CD, EMP_NAME, BASIC_SALARY, FOOD_PAY, DUTY_PAY, DISP_PAY, JOB_PAY, MST_PAY, CCR_PAY, ANN_PAY, OVER_PAY, RD_PAY, VAC_PAY, QF_PAY, WF_PAY, IT_PAY, RES_PAY, PERF_PAY, CB_PAY, SI_PAY, TOTAL_PAY, SAL_TOT_PAY, NAT_PAY, HETH_PAY, EMPL_PAY, SOC_PAY, SOC_TRIP_PAY, CARE_PAY, INC_PAY, LOC_INC_PAY, END_TAX_PAY, END_TAX_LOC_PAY, FINS_PAY, SOC_ENGN_PAY, DORM_PAY, INS_TOT_PAY, SUP_PAY, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES
( #{item.baseYearMonth}, #{item.empType}, #{item.erpEmpCd}, #{item.empName}, #{item.basicSalary}, #{item.foodPay}, #{item.dutyPay}, #{item.dispPay}, #{item.jobPay}, #{item.mstPay}, #{item.ccrPay}, #{item.annPay}, #{item.overPay}, #{item.rdPay}, #{item.vacPay}, #{item.qfPay}, #{item.wfPay}, #{item.itPay}, #{item.resPay}, #{item.perfPay}, #{item.cbPay}, #{item.siPay}, #{item.totalPay}, #{item.salTotPay}, #{item.natPay}, #{item.hethPay}, #{item.emplPay}, #{item.socPay}, #{item.socTripPay}, #{item.carePay}, #{item.incPay}, #{item.locIncPay}, #{item.endTaxPay}, #{item.endTaxLocPay}, #{item.finsPay}, #{item.socEngnPay}, #{item.dormPay}, #{item.insTotPay}, #{item.supPay}, #{item.regEmpSeq} )

/* setPayRollComp */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_PAY_ROLL_COMP ( BASE_YEAR_MONTH, EMP_TYPE, ERP_EMP_CD, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, PAY_TYPE, C_NAT_PAY, C_HETH_PAY, C_EMPL_PAY, E_EMPL_PAY, C_CARE_PAY, C_INDT_PAY, RETIRE_PAY, C_TOT_PAY, E_TOT_PAY, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES
( #{item.baseYearMonth}, #{item.empType}, #{item.erpEmpCd}, #{item.empSeq}, #{item.empName}, #{item.payType}, #{item.cNatPay}, #{item.cHethPay}, #{item.cEmplPay}, #{item.eEmplPay}, #{item.cCarePay}, #{item.cIndtPay}, #{item.retirePay}, #{item.cTotPay}, #{item.eTotPay}, #{item.regEmpSeq} )
mapper.select: /*getEmpSeqByErpCd*/ SELECT EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE ERP_EMP_SEQ = #{erpEmpCd}
